item.title: My DOOM Emacs Configuration
item.description: Table of Contents Intro Housekeeping Font Theme, Appearance, General Behavior Doom Dashboard Fancy Splash Image:ARCHIVE: Custom Faces Setting Colors Hook Global embark vertico org-mode Some variables Hooks Appearance bibtex org-super-agenda org-modern Agenda PDF Export Process Keybinds Export Settings helm-bibtex org-ref org-noter org-roam:ARCHIVE: org-capture pdf-view-mode Keybinds Hooks haskell-mode python-mode Elpy xenops-mode yasnippets ink quiver org-babel haskell-mode writeroom-mode company ox-hugo Intro This config file is organized by mode and/or package. Each mode has their own subsection for common configuration patterns such as keybindings, hooks, setting variables, etc.
